My name is Kevin Aktug. I graduated with honors from The Art Institute of Washington, where I attained my BFA in Game Art and Design. I am a former 3D Environment Artist, currently serving as the Customer Care Technology Specialist at Custom Ink.

I'm also all over the web! Connect with me!
